comment.author: 9919978@N02
comment._content:
2 things--I believe this is 14th looking up broadway (since the question was raised) and that thing behind the lady, now has a statue of Gandhi on it.
(I would not have picked him, but they did not ask me-lol)

Does this woman look black to anyone else? I think she is, which means the Salvation Army was intergrated when almost nothing else was.
Unless they only used blacks for this kind of weather. hee hee
Even if she is white, they probably were intergrated.

addie B)
